string-array.name: onboarding_entries
string-array.item: Envelope is an experimental app which temporarily transforms your phone into a simpler, calmer device, helping you to take a break away from your digital world.
Before we begin you’ll need to print out and fold a special envelope.\n\nYou can download a pdf with instructions here
This app acts as a dialer to make calls, in order to use it you’ll need to give the app access to make and manage phone calls.
In order to receive calls you will need to make this app the default phone app.\n\nYou should reset this to the phone system dialer when you have finished using the app.
This app stays on your screen once you lock your phone away in the envelope, we’ll now pin it to your screen.
Envelope is now pinned to your screen.\n\nTo unpin it at any time click the X in the top corner on the next screen.
